title: Dating | FlexPay
summary: FlexPay's Invisible Recovery™ solution optimizes failed payment recovery for dating services, aiming to reduce churn and increase revenue. It intelligently adapts to each failed payment using AI to maximize recovery rates and improve customer lifetime value.
key_points: Reduces involuntary subscriber churn for dating services.
Increases customer LTV by recovering current and future billings.
Utilizes AI-powered Invisible Recovery™ for personalized payment recovery strategies.
Aims for an average 33% increase in total revenue collected in the first 12 months.
